page.title: 07HOME LIFE 2
page.content: The day starts when my parents arise at 6.30am.My eldest brother does a paper round at 7.00am.We breakfast at 7.30am and this consists of cereal and toast.When not attending school we have a snack lunch and a cooked meal in the evening.We use electricity for cooking as there is no gas supply.We use coal and anthracite for heating.We listen to the radio, watch television and play on our home computer.Our only pet is a hamster. My alarm clock wakes me up at 7.15am. I have a bowl of cereal for breakfast and listen to the radio.When I come home from school my tea is being cooked by Mum.We normally have the television on at night.I have a pet cat.
